comments:
At one point, every time I would try to debug my project, I would get the 
exception attached at the end in the log.  This started after the IDE crashed 
during a debug session.  I tried deleting the workspace but that did not solve 
the problem.  Reinstalling eclipse did.

Adding Philippe as CC. Philippe, does this exception (ClassFormatError), 
indicate that somehow, the Eclipse installation became corrupted?

Either the JAR got corrupted or we misgenerated the classfile.
In the latter scenario, it would be reproduceable all the time.

To me, this sounds like a file corruption error. Marking as "wont fix" unless 
the problem is reproduceable.
